text: 4:4 Rom 6:19; 1 Korin 6:13-15; 6:18Egh ia vaghvagh uan amuibar ikɨva deravɨra men gan. Egh Godɨn damazimɨn zuezir araziba ko a ifongezir arazibar amu.4:4 Marazi ghaze, vezɨn kam kamaghɨn ghu: “Ia uan ifongiaba ko nɨghnɨzir kurar ian navir averiabar aven itiba, ia deraghvɨra da bagh uarir gan. Egh Godɨn damazimɨn zuezir araziba ko a ifongezir arazibar amu.”
